songs.name: Bhaag DK Bose
songs.text:
Bm 
F#
 
[Verse 1]
Bm           D        A          Bm
Daddy mujhse bola, tu galati hai meri
Bm     D          A          Bm
Tujhpe Zindagani, guilty hai meri
D         Em
Saabun ki shaqal mein,
            G           F#
Beta tu toh nikla keval jhaag
      F#
Jhaag jhaag bhaag
 
[Pre-Chorus]
      Bm    D          A       Bm
Bhaag bhaag bhaag bhaag
      Bm    D          A       Bm
Bhaag bhagh bhaag bhaag
 
[Verse 2]
Bm         D         A          Bm
Toh by god lag gayi, kya se kya hua
Bm        D       A           Bm
Dekha toh katora, jhaanka toh kuaa
D            Em
Piddi jaissa chuhaa
G                        F#
dum pakda toh nikla kala naag
          F#
Naag naag bhaag
 
[Chorus]
Bm                   D
Bhaag bhaag DK bose, DK bose, D K bose
Bm                  G
Bhaag bhaag DK bose DK bhaag
Bm                   D
Bhaag bhaag DK bose, DK bose, D K bose
A                   Bm
Bhaag bhaag DK bose DK bhaag
Bm                 D
Aandhi aayi aandhi aayi aandhi aayi aandhi
A                    G
Bhaag bhaag DK bose, DK bhaag
Bm                   D
Bhaag bhaag DK bose, DK bose, D K bose
A           Bm
Aandhi Aayi hai

[Verse 3]
Bm
Hum toh hai kabootarr
   Em                         D
Do pahiye ka ek scooter Zinda gi
   A           E
Jo Dhakelo toh Chale
     Bm
Arre kismat ki hai kadki
     Em                    D
Roti kapda aur larki teeno hi
       A        E
Paapad belo toh miley
 
[Bridge]
    G     Em     A
Yeh bheja garden hai
    G       Em    F#  A
Aur tension maali hai yeah
D            Em
Mann ka taan pura
G                           F#
Frustration me chhede ek hi Raag
          F#
Raag raag bhaag
 
[Chorus]
Bm                   D
Bhaag bhaag DK bose, DK bose, D K bose
Bm                  G
Bhaag bhaag DK bose DK bhaag
Bm                   D
Bhaag bhaag DK bose, DK bose, D K bose
A                   Bm
Bhaag bhaag DK bose DK bhaag
Bm                 D
Aandhi aayi aandhi aayi aandhi aayi aandhi
A                    G
Bhaag bhaag DK bose, DK bhaag
Bm                   D
Bhaag bhaag DK bose, DK bose, D K bose
A           Bm
Aandhi Aayi hai
 
[Verse 1]
Bm           D        A          Bm
Daddy mujhse bola, tu galati hai meri
Bm     D          A          Bm
Tujhpe Zindagani, guilty hai meri
D         Em
Saabun ki shaqal mein,
            G           F#
Beta tu toh nikla keval jhaag
      F#
Jhaag jhaag bhaag
